casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Anthony Lee MCNAIR 230P17-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2018 Kimberly P. Hoppin, Attorney at Law, Anthony Lee McNair, for McNair, Anthony Lee. Michael T. Wood, Special Deputy Attorney General, Kimberly S. Robb, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th of January 2018 by Defendant to Submit Memorandum in Support of Motion for Summary Judgment:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018."
